title: Inspiration for self-promotion. My thoughts after reading Show Your Work!

If you’re an incoming #computerscience first year and you’re looking for a leg up the McMaster Computer Science Society is hosting a #Haskell primer next Tuesday at 8pm on the CS discord: https://lnkd.in/eAzeb8g
Just finished updating my #github profile Readme at https://lnkd.in/eFN2nxk after putting it off for a while. If you’re a student and haven’t made one yet I’d highly recommend it,
